definitions.definition: One who, or that which, bleaches .
A stand of tiered planks used as seating for spectators, often outdoors.
examples: There could be a rough crowd out in the bleachers .

definitions.definition: The tiered seating provided for the audience at a television filming.
definitions.label_groups: US , television , usually in the plural , by extension

main_definition: One who, or that which, bleaches .
secondary_definitions: ( US , usually in the plural ) A stand of tiered planks used as seating for spectators, often outdoors.
( US , television , usually in the plural , by extension ) The tiered seating provided for the audience at a television filming.
